title: 2D Charts
summary: 2D charts can be easily created to explore data relationships

title: 3D Charts
summary: 3D charts can easily be created to visualize data in a new way

title: Animations
summary: All plots can be animated as a sequence of frames

title: The Picta Canvas
summary: The Canvas is the most general component in the Picta library

title: Chart
summary: Charts structure how the graph is rendered

title: Config
summary: Config specifies interactivity of a chart

title: Your First Chart
summary: This section will outline how to create your first chart using the Picta library.

title: Picta
summary: Picta is a a graphing library for Scala. It is designed to take a grammatical approach to graph construction, which means charts are composable and easy to use.

title: Chart Layout
summary: Chart Layouts specify in detail how the plot will be rendered

title: Series
summary: Series components wrap data and specify how they should be transformed
